description: Try our easy to follow Charred Beef With Rice Noodles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Charred Beef With Rice Noodles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add noodles to wok with beef and sauce mixture. Toss over high heat for 1 minute. Transfer to a plate and top with peanuts. Serve with sliced chilli, if using.
